title: Black screen after champ select
body:
I have mac.

When champ select finishes the whole screen turns black.

It doesn't say it's a firewall or anything. w

;__;

replies.body: try openening file location then go to RADS folder then solutions then open lol_game_client folder then realeases then open the next one then open deploy folder then find 2 files called logitech something or other XD delete those 2 files. . . now go back to RADS folder Open the Projects folder delete the LOL launcher file then open LOL before you log in there will be a ? in the top right corner open that and run repair then when thats done restart computer and run LOL as admin!!!! good luck worked for me

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=rrVlgz9Y,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T11:34:57.330+0000)
>
> Yeah it did.

so glad dude add me in game because i had the same problem but the fix stopped working add me and if it happens again let me know and i should be able to help
{{champion:106}}
